title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1156.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1156.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

Unless expressly otherwise provided, whenever used in this

Part the following terms shall mean or include: (a) Agency means any State or municipal
department, board, bureau, division, commission, committee, public authority, public corporation, council, office or other governmental entity performing a
governmental or proprietary function for the State or any one or more
municipalities thereof, except the Judiciary or the State

Legislature. (b) Authority means the

Niagara Frontier Transportation Authority. (c) Subsidiary corporation means the Niagara

Frontier Transit Metro System, Inc., which exists now, or any additional
subsidiary corporation which may be activated or created at a later
time. (d) Chairman means the
chairman of the authority and the Niagara Frontier Transit Metro System, Inc., or his delegate. (e) Records means
any information kept, held, filed, produced or reproduced by the authority or a
subsidiary corporation, in any physical form whatsoever including but not
limited to reports, statements, examinations, memoranda, opinions, folders, files, books, manuals, pamphlets, forms, papers, designs, drawings, maps, photos, letters, microfilms, computer tapes or discs, rules, regulations or
codes. (f) Records access officer
means the chief financial officer of the authority and subsidiary corporation
or his or her delegate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1156.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
